show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
The Tamiflu Deception Dental Xrays Linked to Brain Tumors Phthalates are now LInked to Type 2 Diabetes. The Side... <!--more--> Effects to Breast Cancer Treatment Vicki’s 20:20 Health Tips: God’s Pharmacy More on God’s Pharmacy Callers: Alan (Brooklyn): Questions re.
